attributes.action: bring in legislation to outlaw discrimination on single people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is grossly unfair that single people are being discriminated against, by having to pay "under occupancy" charges when booking holidays etc.  This has now got so abusive that single people are being charged supplements on a single room by holiday companies and hotels etc.,  This is not only Vicitmisation but blatant discrimination.
